conferences.title: Unlocking design in a design system with custom properties
conferences.summary: A deep-dive on how to leverage custom properties in a design system.

conferences.title: Make web development fun again, with web components!
conferences.summary: A joint presentation with Penn State on how web components can make development workflows fun and efficient.

conferences.title: One of these things is not like the other; identifying patterns in a mock-up
conferences.summary: An example-rich talk about how to break out mock-ups into patterns for maximum reusability.

conferences.title: Reduce, reuse, recycle: Modular CSS
conferences.summary: Creating highly-optimized patterns by increasing reusability in your codebase, thus reducing the size of your output.
